author: Staff Reporter
text:
A stray dog died as an object it tried to bite in a heap of garbage exploded near Arakkonam on Tuesday.

The incident occurred in LGS Nagar in Puliyamangalam village near Arakkonam, in a place located couple of hundred meters away from the compound wall of Naval Airbase INS Rajali and about a hundred meter away from Chennai-Bangalore rail line. Deputy Inspector General of Police Tamil Chandran and Superintendent of Police Senthilkumari visited the spot on Tuesday night.

A government veterinary team conducted post mortem on the dead dog on Wednesday. Arakkonam police booked a case and investigation is on.

The nature of the object that exploded is yet to be ascertained.
title: Stray dog bites object in garbage, dies
